author: kfogel
msg: With Peter Davis:
* subversion/clients/cmdline/prompt.c
(svn_cl__prompt_user): Prompt to stderr instead of stdout.
See issue #1117 for more details.

author: cmpilato
msg: Patch by: Peter Davis <peter@pdavis.cx>
* subversion/include/svn_xml.h
* subversion/libsvn_subr/xml.c
(xml_unescape, svn_xml_unescape_string,
svn_xml_unescape_cstring, svn_xml_unescape_stringbuf):
Delete unused xml_unescape functions as discussed in issue 1118.

author: sussman
msg: A lot of tool scripts are now auto-generated;  I'm tired of seeing
them as "?" in 'svn status'.
* tools/hook-scripts:  add three perl scripts to svn:ignore property.
* tools/client-side:  add svn_load_dirs.pl to svn:ignore property.
* tools/backup:  add hot_backup.py to svn:ignore property.

author: striker
msg: * subversion/libsvn_delta/diff.c
(svn_diff3): Handle the case where we should see a conflict
if two lcs segments don't match up.  This bug only showed
itself if the syncpoint was EOF.  This fix makes trans-test 5:
"update locally modified file with eol-style 'native'" pass.
We probably need further testing to ensure this bug doesn't
reach beyond the 'EOF' case.

author: mass
msg: Avoid re-reading the server config, and report errors via neon.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure) : generate comments about SSL server options.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c :
(struct ssl_verify_baton_t) : removed svn_error_t member, added svn_config_t member
(ssl_set_verify_callback) : pass svn_config_t. No need now for a subpool.
